mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rogers, Hortensia Monroe
mdRecord.dcterms:description: I do not feel alarmed for grandfather. Would go to New York directly but cannot see that I could be of any use to him. Bring Monroe to her house but recommends they consult Dr. Physic in Philadelphia. Thought she had scarlet fever. I shall begin today to wean my baby. I cannot suckle her any longer. I have not strength.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hortensia M. Rogers, "Druid Hill" near Baltimore Md.," to Mrs. Eliza Kortright Monroe Hay., 4 May 1831
